name: Wild Magic
description: Your innate magic comes from wild forces of chaos, causing unpredictable surges of arcane energy.

1.name: Wild Magic Surge
1.description: Your spellcasting can unleash unpredictable magical effects.

rows.effect: Roll on this table at the start of each of your turns for the next minute.

1.name: Tides of Chaos
1.description: You gain advantage on one attack roll, ability check, or saving throw. The DM can then force a Wild Magic Surge.

6.name: Bend Luck
6.description: You can spend sorcery points to roll 1d4 and apply the result as a bonus or penalty to a roll.

14.name: Controlled Chaos
14.description: You roll twice on the Wild Magic Surge table and choose which result applies.

18.name: Spell Bombardment
18.description: When you roll maximum damage for a spell, you can roll additional damage dice.
